actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 4,11-Triphenodioxazinedisulfonic acid,6, 13-dichloro-3, 10-bis[[2-[[-[[4-fluoro-6-[(2-sulfophenyl) amino} - 1,3,5-trizin-2-yl] amino] propyl] amino]- lithium sodium salt.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2007, the duty on 4,11-Triphenodioxazinedisulfonic acid,6, 13-dichloro-3, 10-bis[[2-[[-[[4-fluoro-6-[(2-sulfophenyl) amino} - 1,3,5-trizin-2-yl] amino] propyl] amino]- lithium sodium salt.
